import sys

def main(*args,**kwargs) :
    for __ in range(input()) :
        n = input()
        list1  = [i for i in map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())]
        list2  = [i for i in map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())]
        list1.sort()
        list2.sort()
        temp , ans = 1 , 0
        for i in range(n-1) :
            j = i+1
            while j < n and list1[j] < list2[i] :
                temp += 1
                j += 1
            ans = max(temp,ans)
            temp = 1
        print max(ans,temp)
        
if __name__ == "__main__" :
    main()
